name: PicTris!
description:
I made  Tetris using Pico-8, the excellent fantasy computer by Lexaloffle!

Controls:
Left - Right: Move piece left and right
Down: Move piece down faster
Up: Drop the piece instantly
Z - X: Rotate the piece left and right
Z and X held together: Store the piece

The goal here is to clear 150 lines before getting to the top! Have fun!
